DocsDescription: The OpenZiti project is an open source initiative focused on bringing Zero Trust to any application. The project provides all the pieces required to implement or integrate Zero Trust into your solutions.
FeedbackDescription: Having issues? We'll gather the logs for you and attach them to your bug report so we can help.
